name: Alternative Approaches

structure.request: Provide at least 3 different approaches to solve this:
structure.format:
For each approach, include:
- Approach name
- Description
- Pros and cons
- Use cases

example:
Problem: Handle real-time data synchronization between client and server

Provide at least 3 different approaches to solve this:

For each approach, include:
- Approach name
- Description
- Pros and cons
- Use cases
